name: Floruit
description:
In Floruit, you play as The Forbidden Fruit of the Knowledge of Good & Evil as you try to restore harmony to the garden by ridding it of its pests. Slack on your job and the pests will overrun the garden! To avoid this, use the unique plants and their strange abilities. Dig plants up to activate them and bury them again to keep them safe. Deal with pests that try to trample over your garden or pests that attack from the sky or beneath the earth.  Use your wits and think fast!

Arrow Keys to Move

Up Arrow to dig up a plant

Down Arrow to bury a plant

R key to restart stage

F2 to to restart the whole game

Enter or Space to start the game

PgUp and PgDn to skip levels (don't do this unless you absolutely have to!)
